collection.name: Big Bird
collection.openText: A month later, we came to this conclusion: There was no such “beast” in the forest.

observe.desc:
[ {There is a tale of a beast that lies in the deepest, darkest part of the forest who dazzles creatures away never to be seen again.
To protect all creatures from the beast, the big bird burned all of its feathers to make a wick, and then made a lamp that would burn forever.
With this eternally lit lamp, the big bird wandered the forest, warning the creatures to not stray too deep into the trees.
Thanks to the large bird, fewer creatures fell victim to the beast in the forest. However, it was still concerned for the creatures still being killed by the beast.
An idea struck the big bird’s mind: “If I kill the creatures first, then no one would be killed by the beast!”
Since then, only rumors of a beast that would bite your head off flew around the dark forest.
It is said that the beast carefully examines and stares at its victims to see if they are the beast that lures helpless creatures away.
This is a tale from a town in the <Location Redacted> area. We heard the tale from the town's oldest inhabitant, <Redacted>. Although there is a general assumption that the tale was told to prevent children from entering the forest, it is uncertain who first inherited the tale.} ]

[ {And it turns out that the tale was not made up.
“We could find this large bird in the forest. Right after that, we tried to look for the ‘Beast that dazzles people.’ We searched through every nook and cranny of the forest. Investigated every single creature in detail. A month later, we came to this conclusion: There was no such ‘beast’ in the forest. Except for that big bird.” ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: After 5 employees died within the facility, the Qliphoth Counter decreased. However, deaths caused by Execution Bullets were not recognized.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter increased.
$0 breached its Containment Unit regardless of its Qliphoth Counter when the emergency situation in the facility reached the 2nd Trumpet.
There was a blackout in the Department where $0 was roaming. Employees who are in the Department with a blackout may become enchanted by $0.
It seems enchanted targets receive less damage. However, after a certain amount of time had passed, those targets made their way to where $0 was and died from its attack.
Enchanted employees were freed from their trance as soon as they were out of the Department that suffered from the blackout.
